InteractionSummaryParticipant.name: InteractionSummaryParticipant
InteractionSummaryParticipant.description: Represents a user with whom an interaction summary is shared.

InteractionSummaryId.description: The interaction summary that's shared with this user.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this participant is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interaction summary participant.

ParticipantId.description: The user or group that the interaction summary is shared with.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The role assigned to this participant.
